posts._title: Kurt Gerron & Karel Pecený – Theresienstadt. Ein Dokumentarfilm aus dem jüdischen Siedlungsgebiet AKA Theresienstadt: A Documentary Film from the Jewish Settlement Area (1944)
posts.title: Theresienstadt Ein Dokumentarfilm aus dem jüdischen Siedlungsgebiet
posts.excerpt: Theresienstadt (1944) Quote:The Führer Gives a City to the Jews is the only film known to be made by the Nazis inside an operating concentration camp. Germany’s Ministry of Propaganda produced this 1944 film about Theresienstadt, the “model” ghetto established by the Nazis in 1941 in Terezin, a town in the former Czechoslovakia.
posts.titleEnglish: Theresienstadt: A Documentary Film from the Jewish Settlement Area
